com.a2a.googlechart.charts
Class Chart

java.lang.Object
  com.a2a.googlechart.charts.Chart
Direct Known Subclasses:
BarChart, LineChart, PieChart, ScatterPlot, VennDiagram
public abstract class Chart
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a generic chart.

setGrid

public void setGrid(float xAxisStepSize,
                    float yAxisStepSize)
             throws InvalidFeatureForChartTypeException
Sets the grid for the chart.

Parameters:
xAxisStepSize - Space between x-axis grid lines in relation to axis range
yAxisStepSize - Space between y-axis grid lines in relation to axis range.
Throws:
InvalidFeatureForChartTypeException - if the chart type does not support grid

setGrid

public void setGrid(float xAxisStepSize,
                    float yAxisStepSize,
                    float lengthLineSegment,
                    float lengthBlankSegment)
             throws InvalidFeatureForChartTypeException
Sets the grid for the chart.

Parameters:
xAxisStepSize - Space between x-axis grid lines in relation to axis range
yAxisStepSize - Space between y-axis grid lines in relation to axis range.
lengthLineSegment - Length of each line segment in a grid line
lengthBlankSegment - Length of each blank segment in a grid line
Throws:
InvalidFeatureForChartTypeException - if the chart type does not support grid

addFillArea

public void addFillArea(FillArea fillArea)
Adds a fill area to the chart. Fill areas are fills between / under lines.

Parameters:
fillArea - FillArea object

addShapeMarker

public void addShapeMarker(ShapeMarker shapeMarker)
Adds a shape marker to the chart. Shape markers are used to call attention to a data point on the chart.

Parameters:
shapeMarker - ShapeMarker object

addRangeMarker

public void addRangeMarker(RangeMarker rangeMarker)
Adds a range marker to the chart. Range markers are colored bands on the chart.

Parameters:
rangeMarker - RangeMarker object
